definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

pinyin: Fei4 er3 ma3 da4 ding4 li3

sentences.english: It is proved that the Fermat Grand Theorem is tenable in the first case.
sentences.chinese: 證明了費爾馬大定理第一情形成立。

sentences.english: "He was very strong, huge, " says Vermaelen with a grin.
sentences.chinese: “他非常強壯，高大，”費爾馬倫露齒一笑說。

sentences.english: Introduction to Algebra, Number Theory, Fermat's Last Theorem, etc.
sentences.chinese: 代數，數論，費爾馬大定理等介紹。

sentences.english: Algebra, Number Theory, Fermat's Last Theorem, etc.
sentences.chinese: 代數，數論，費爾馬大定理等介紹。

sentences.english: Vidic (another mild-mannered henchman) is a role model. "I like defenders in England the most, " Vermaelen says.
sentences.chinese: “我最喜歡英格蘭的後衛，”費爾馬倫說。
